dublinCore.dc:title: 115 HR 3972 IH: Family Office Technical Correction Act of 2017
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mrs. Carolyn B. Maloney of New York introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Financial Services

form.official-title: To clarify that family offices and family clients are accredited investors, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Family Office Technical Correction Act of 2017.

Any person who is a family office or a family client, as defined in section 275.202(a)(11)(G)â€“1 of title 17, Code of Federal Regulations, shall be deemed to be an accredited investor, as defined in Regulation D of the Securities and Exchange Commission (or any successor thereto) under the Securities Act of 1933.
